resources:
LeanTest
Welcome to the LeanQuiz App
With this Quiz, I would like to show you some calculation method as well as some good example of the Lean thinking. after you complete this Quiz, you will have some basic image about the Lean. Some hint: OEE means - Overall Equipment Effectiveness. Think before answer :)
Please give your name:
The answer is wrong! Remaining tries: The answer is correct! Show answer
//questions 8/1. Which situation would you choose if you want to achive the biggest output? Running 3 machinges with 60% OEE Running 2 machinges with 90% OEE Correct answer: B, you need less peaple, less amortization and less energy consumption to operate
2. Which one is my better machine? Machine A: Rate to Plan= 50%, Utilization= 100, Yield= 98 Machine B: Rate to Plan= 85%, Utilization= 90, Yield= 85 Correct answer: B, OEE = Rate to plan * Utilization * Yield; A=49%, B=65%
3. I had 96 minutes of unplanned downtime of a 8 hours shift. What is my utilization value in percentage?
4. What is 5s? 5s is a method to keep a workplace in order, safe and clean. 5s is a model of the BMW
5. Which picture shows a good example of 5s?
6. What is Poka-yoke? Poka-yoke is a Japanese soda drink Poka-yoke is a mistake proofing method
7. Which one is a good example for Poka-yoke?
8. Which components are part of the OEE? (multiple selection) Performance Utilization Yield Gross profit
Congratulations! Your Quiz score is: 0 points
